name: Pokers Wii
overview: (Google translated from official Japanese WiiWare listing) It is an action puzzle game with poker as a theme. We will gradually replace cards that rise up in the field and we will erase the roles of poker. If you disappear with multiple roles, a chain is generated and a high score. In various game modes such as "Namaru" which clears all 10 stages in order, "Sowaku Aishatsuku" competing in the score of 3 minutes, "Sending Bagu Dan to the other party with a role" I can enjoy it.
